channel.title: Apple on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on Today I Learned

item.description: That the default Mac file system uses case-insensitive paths: see https://support.apple.com/guide/disk-utility/file-system-formats-dsku19ed921c/mac#:~:text=You%20can%20use,volume%2E%20For%20example%2C%20folders%20named%20%E2%80%9CHomework%E2%80%9D%20and%20%E2%80%9CHOMEWORK%E2%80%9D%20are%20two%20different%20folders
